##Write a user defined function using any of the variables from the data set
  
```{r}
m <- c(45,34,34,34,67)
  getmode <- function(m) {
   uniqv <- unique(m)
   uniqv[which.max(tabulate(match(m, uniqv)))]
 }
  getmode(m)
```
